title: Simulation-Based Project Learning for Medical Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare systems and foundational leadership concepts
context.additional_context: Learners experience leadership scenarios that may occur in real healthcare settings via simulations, cultivating team-based problem-solving skills. Digital devices and collaborative tools are provided in virtual environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict situations in medical teams within simulation environments and apply effective communication strategies
Learners can design and execute decision-making processes to improve healthcare services under resource-constrained conditions
Learners can diagnose team leadership competencies and develop improvement plans using the ADELIS model-based evaluation system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
